A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved the new movie and I've seen it 5 times and counting! Sure I was upset that Lupe died but that is the way of things and that's what happened to both Obi-wan & Yoda as well they turned into force ghosts. Luke will be back as force ghost in Episode 9. Leia was to have been the central character that Episode 9 focused on in trying to save her son Ben Solo\, from the dark side. I wonder how this will play out now? Was Leia to have died as well just like Han & Luke before? See the move again and you will enjoy it more. Trust me. You will notice things you didn't see in your first viewing.
